project.name: CHS Red piezométrica actual: CNP, prec. mensual

titul.text: Evolución de la cota piezométrica en el sondeo {}

upper_serie.select: SELECT IPA2.FECHA, IPA1.Z-IPA2.PNP AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD=IPA2.COD WHERE IPA1.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>=? AND IPA2.FECHA<=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA;

upper_relation.select: SELECT COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? AND ACTIVO=1 ORDER BY COD2;
upper_relation.select_distancia: SELECT X_UTM, Y_UTM FROM IPA1 WHERE COD=?;

lower_relation.select: SELECT nmasub FROM ipa1_masub WHERE dh=7 AND COD=?;

lower_serie.select: SELECT IDINM, FECHA, P FROM P WHERE IDINM=? AND FECHA>=? AND FECHA<=? AND P>0 ORDER BY FECHA"
